ERASESTART.desc: Clear all spectrums and start acquiring

NBINS.desc: Number of bins to use in spectrum

TREAL.desc: Real time since start of acquisition

TDWELL.desc: Set integration time [s] for incrementing bin number

BINADV.desc: Set internal or external bin advance signal

END.desc: Warm to room temp and stop
